snippet: The proposed labor agreement between the United Automobile Workers and Ford Motor is slightly richer than the deals agreed to at General Motors and Fiat Chrysler.
abstract: United Automobile Workers leaders endorse proposed four-year labor contract with Ford Motor Company; agreement tops contracts between union workers and General Motors and Fiat Chrysler.
lead_paragraph: The proposed labor agreement between the United Automobile Workers and Ford Motor is slightly richer than the deals agreed to at General Motors and Fiat Chrysler.

headline.main: U.A.W.’s Tentative Deal With Ford Tops Other Automaker Contracts
headline.print_headline: U.A.W.’s Tentative Deal With Ford Tops Other Automaker Contracts
